response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high potential impact on your business, I understand its intrinsic worth to you stands at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a strategic price of $1,400,000, aiming to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 1400000}
